item.title: Pk zones
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m in need of help of making pk zones…pretty simple coding but I can’t figure out what I did wrong…Heres my coding

public void checkwildy() { if((absX >= 2518 && absX <= 2531 && absY >= 4767 && absY <= 4786)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = false; } } public void checkwildy2() { if((absX >= 2518 && absX <= 2531 && absY >= 4767 && absY <= 4786)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = false; } } public void checkwildy3() { if((absX >= 3243 && absX <= 3271 && absY >= 3426 && absY <= 3430)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = false; } }

this pk spot is supposed to be right in front of varrock east bank, inbetween dummy room and the bank…

Read full topic
